featured.text: Many scientists, however, say there is no evidence that Blue Monday causes any more sadness than other specific days of the year.

other.text: Which of the following statements is true about the color of angelfish? (A) Female angelfish are blue in color.
Angelfish live in groups, and each group has one male fish, which is blue in color, and four female fish, which are yellow.

definition.zh_def: 藍色的，通常與天空或海洋的顏色相關。
definition.en_def: A color that resembles the clear sky or the deep sea, typically associated with calmness and tranquility.
definition.example: The sky turned a beautiful shade of blue at sunset.
